=Release Notes for 1.0 (2009-Dec-27)=

==New Features/Stories==

  * [http://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/1684341 Change log4j settings to print stuff out in DEBUG]
  * [http://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/1716900 Data-Driven EUC Tests]
  * [http://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/1844631 Specify bean names in cmd line args]
  * [http://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/1716776 Add support for selenese tests]
  * [http://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/1779099 Create project xml to automatically feed arguments]

==Defects Fixed==

  * ID 9 - Change log output from ComponoSpine to SpectacularSpine!
  * ID 12 - When a EUC step does not succeed, error message is not helpful
  * ID 13 - Too much output in INFO logging
